irobots.vision

Class ColorSensor

  • java.lang.Object
    • irobots.vision.ColorSensor

  • public class ColorSensor
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstracts the access to the NXT color sensor and provides utility functions to read information about detected chips or border lines.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BLACK 
      static int WHITE 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorSensor() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean chipDetected()
      This method returns true if the color sensor has detected a colored chip.
      int getChipColor()
      This method returns the color of the detected chip.
      boolean lineDetected()
      This method returns true if the color sensor has detected the black boundary line.
